title: Credit dard site says I need to update browser,
content: Cannot access banking website - get page that is all type-written down the left side, credit card site says I need to up date my browser, computer says it is up to date; downloaded and reinstalled firefox - no change i don't know what to do next
creator: suenurseperson

title: Roboform addon's lower toolbar sometimes gets disabled without my changing the setting
content: I use the Roboform Password manager addon in Firefox. It has the option to display a toolbar at the bottom of the browser to give me easier access to my passwords. I have enabled this option. From time to time, for no apparent reason, the lower toolbar stops displaying and when I go into the Firefox Add-on manager, I find the option to display the lower toolbar has been toggled to off. I don't know why this happens, and it is only intermittent. Something must trigger this change in the settings, but I don't know what. Help!
creator: heylmun@gmail.com

title: Flickering in wlroots wayland
content: when hovering over buttons in certain extensions and in the firefox menu, flickers occur, sometimes crashing the compositor if it doesn't have mitigations. tested in Hyprland from the AUR package https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/hyprland-git
creator: benmoreosm

title: How can I get the soft hyphen to be underlined within a link in Firefox?
content:
When I have a link with soft hyphens, and when the link breaks at the hyphen, the hyphen comes out without the underline.

I tried to force underline by wrapping the soft hyphen with a styled span tag, but it's not working.

Whereas in Brave the hyphen comes out underlined, which is what I need.

How can I underline the soft hyphen in Firefox?
creator: av0gadr0

title: Firefox puede editar documentos PDF incluso protegidos con contraseña
content: Buenas tardes, por que el navegador Firefox puede editar archivos PDF incluso cuando estan protegidos por contraseña? es bueno pero a la vez es malo, ya que al momento de querer proteger el archivo propio se podria editar incluso si esta protegido. Aguardo comentario. Saludos y gracias de antemano
creator: anthonijesus

title: Firefox Slowdown (Memory leak?) after Oct 7 update on an M1 iMac 24" MacOS12.6
content: Since the Oct 7 Firefox update (105.0.3 ) for Mac, I've experienced slowdowns and freezes that affect Finder operations as well as Fox. I have a M1 iMac 27" running MacOS12.6. It goes away by when I close and restart Firefox and/or do Mac maintenance with Onyx. Because the effect is progressive, starting mild and getting worse, I think you've got a memory leak. I 1st noticed it in a 30-tab environment. I'll see if it affects my Mac-Air running an earlier MacOS
creator: jvbeaupre

title: Overlapping text
content: I've read the forums, i've tried adjustments for days on Win 11 and firefox. Zoomed in zoomed out, adjust font sizes Either it's way too tiny to read or the page is fine but text over laps i've tried the zoom in on text only as well Basically tried everything. enclosing a youtube page for reference
creator: cyntaur

title: doubleclick.net
content:
Un controllo di about:memory mi dà sempre doubleclick.net attivo. Ho rimosso tutti i cookies, che vengono comunque cancellati in chiusura di sessione. Ho verificato che doubleclick.net non sia tra le estensioni. Qualcuno sa suggerire come eliminarlo? Sul web ho trovato soltanto riferimenti a vecchie versioni di Firefox.

Sempre in about:memory trovo la lista di estensioni allegata in immagine; mi lasciano perplesso diverse di loro, in particolare quelle di amazon e di bing, che non ho mai installato. Le sole estensioni che ho installato sono Page Translator, Simple Translate e Video DownloadHelper. Forse qualcuna tra queste ha installato sottobanco le altre? Mi pare strano, ma non si sa mai
creator: alberto.emiliani

title: Mac için Firefox'ta şifreleri içe aktarma
content: İçe aktarma sihirbazını kullanarak şifreleri aktarmak istiyorum. Öncelikle Safari'den aktaramıyorum çünkü seçeneklerde yalnızca yer imleri beliriyor. Bu sebeple Safari'den dışa aktararak Chrome'da içe aktardım. Sihirbazda Chrome seçeneğiyle ilerlediğimdeyse sonuca hiçbir etkisi olmuyor. Herhangi bir uyarı mesajı da almıyorum. Öte yandan about:config kısmından "signon.management.page.fileImport.enabled" istemini False konumundan True konumuna getirmek suretiyle dosyadan içe aktarma ayarını da denedim. Aynı şekilde tarayıcı işleme cevap vermiyor.
creator: asafoksuz

title: How do I find a problem on the Support Page that I reported yesterday?
content:
I posted a problem yesterday and received an email from Mozilla Support asking me for information. I have NO IDEA how to find my original support problem to add comments - PLEASE let me know HOW to answer the Mozilla Support email (other than this way). Here is what I got in the email:

"I can replicate the issue in 105.0.3 and see that it works in Chrome. see screenshot What version of macOS? What version of Firefox are you running?"

My answers are: macOS Monterey 12.6 (put on a few days ago - upgrade from Big Sur) 105.0.3 (64 bit) - which is marked "Up to date"

So, I have the latest operating system for my MacBook AIr and the latest Firefox Browser and the display issue still exists.
creator: HealthNut01

title: Firefox - Twitter apertura schede
content: Nonostante nelle impostazioni non abbia abilitato l'opzione: "Porta in primo piano la scheda quando si aprono link, immagini o contenuti multimediali in una nuova scheda" solo sul sito Twitter, ogni volta che premo la rotella del mouse per aprire un tweet in un nuova scheda, in automatico mi porta la nuova scheda in primo piano. Ho provato in altri siti e il problema non si presenta. Sbaglio io o è un bug? Come posso evitare questa apertura in primo piano su twitter?

title: Word online
content: I'm running Firefox 102.3.0esr. After the latest update, I can no longer get Word online (365, I think?) to open in the desktop app. I go to Edit, use in desktop app, accept the popup, and nothing happens. Excel opens in the app, as it always has. Both work in Chrome. Any thoughts? Thanks.
creator: cathym97403

title: Syncing passwords
content: I just signed up for a firefox account and synced passwords, but when I log into firefox with the same account on a different device, it doesn't remember my passwords. What gives? The only reason I bothered with having a firefox account is cause I forget my passwords all the time, so I thought if I just have to log into my firefox account then I would be set. Did I misunderstand? And if so, what is the point in being logged in to a firefox account? It doesn't seem logical to have all my browser history connected to my email address, even if it is a safe company now. All the other companies sold out eventually with all of their member data going to the highest bidder. Anyhow. Any answers here would be really appreciated. Thank you!!!
creator: emma2323

This problem has not occurred after updating Firefox on my laptop Mac Book Pro.

Both computer use OS High Sierra (10.13.6).

Please advise. Thank you.

title: webcam
content:
I need help connecting a Logitech C920X PRO HD WEBCAM. I have installed OBS Studio software to connect the webcam to my desktop. The immediate purpose I need this camera to send a photo of myself to IDMe.com to verify my identity for access to my records. Eventually, I would like to use the webcam for other seemingly useful options such as ZOOM and other teleconferencing software.

When I initiate OBS Studio, I can see ambient sounds being registered by the audio scale on the OBS window graphics. Even though I can see a direct response by the audio graphics, I see no video response by the OBS Studio program.

When I open the Logitech G HUB, I can see myself on screen within this software frame. Thanks Bo Granz 410-829-9869 bgranz@comcast.net
creator: bgranz

title: Youtube buffering delay on startup, but only sometimes
content: When I start youtube, it will sometimes take upwards of 10 seconds to initially load the video. It works perfectly fine afterwards, and does not happen in chrome. Using troubleshoot mode didn't help; reinstalling Firefox didn't help. However, it usually goes away after a while, and then it works normally? I don't know and it's really annoying.

title: Two-factor authentication does not work with the Yubico Authenticator Android app for generating 6 digital temporary codes for login.
content:
Hello. I wanted to secure my Firefox account and add two factor authentication.

But two-factor authentication does not work with the Yubico Authenticator Android app for generating the 6 digital temporary codes for logging in that I use.

When I add a firefox account to my Yubico Authenticator application for Android and generate a 6-digit code, when I want to add it and confirm it on the firefox settings page - it does not work and the code entered is unrecognizable. This is why I am unable to finish adding two factor authentication.

Can you check it and update and support the Yubico Authenticator application from Android?

Regards.

title: How can i rank my website on Mozilla?
content: There are various search engines with their own term and conditions for ranking. If I want to rank my website website how many months would it take after everything is done?
creator: mianzarrar2630

title: Unique User ID in each FireFox install
content:
Hi,

It seems there is a Unique User ID in each FireFox install. This is how whatsapp can login again even without cookies. One can find in firefox BuildID ProductID ApplicationID EnrollmentIDs and about 32k more of telemetry data (see crash info), incl plenty of detailed hardware and software info that creates a fingerprint of the user. Who had that horrible idea?

This is VERY disconcerting given that you laud yourselves as privacy protectors.

Please explain why you collect all that data.
creator: spdgnzls

title: How to update Firefox in an environment with no Internet connection
content: Is there a way to update Firefox to the latest version when I am not connected to the Internet?
creator: Adyotch

title: Browser problem
content: Often with the BBC website I get error 410 gone. This usually but not exclusively happens when I click a link on a news or sport page. I do not get the error if I try the same action in the Edge browser. This happens with or without my VPN connected. It would seem that other users have this problem but I cannot find a solution.
creator: colinblakeburn

title: Websites Not Using Default System Theme
content:
I changed the systme theme in windows 10 to dark, websites still show up in white theme. Most websites that support dark mode will by default use the system theme, in my case dark.. So why isn't it working? For example i use the brave search engine search.brave.com, when i klick the settings icon it shows that by default it uses the system theme, as i said my system theme is dark but then why bravesearch using the white theme? It's not only bravesearch, same with duckduckgo search and same with youtube, all of them use the system theme, but for whatever reason everything is displayed in white theme instead of dark.

So i changed this setting in about:config but no matter which value i use (1,2,3) websites will always use system default - white theme, but infact my system theme is dark, how can i fix this? defaultPref("browser.theme.content-theme", 2);
creator: Firefox_Beginner

title: Firefox - Autocompilamento dati in un campo errato.
content: Aprendo un determinato forum c'è un box ove è possibile cercare gli utenti per nickname, dopo aver fatto accesso con le mie credenziali, ogni volta in questo box di ricerca compare sempre il mio indirozzo email. L'autocompilazione mi inserisce in automatico questo valore, ma non è un box di login e sinceramente mi dà fastidio vedere il mio indirizzo email lì presente, anche perchè ogni volta devo cancellare per poter scrivere eventuali nickname. Come posso risolvere questo problema di autocompilamento in un campo errato?
creator: Aviators

title: GSOD IRQL NOT LESS OR EQUAL NETIO.SYS
content:
Getting GSoD IRQL_NOT_LESS_OR_EQUAL, process firefox.exe

I need some help with this one. Happening at least 5 times a day. I can provide more info if needed. I've also opened a question on Microsoft's board. Thanks in advance.

From WinDBG of Memory.dmp

PROCESS_NAME: firefox.exe

TRAP_FRAME: fffffd837bfb1ef0 -- (.trap 0xfffffd837bfb1ef0) NOTE: The trap frame does not contain all registers. title: Firefox se nespustí
content:
Po stažení instalátoru a instalace dle standartních kroků firefox nelze spustit. Pouze problikne prázdné okno.

Používám Windows 10 bez dodatečných bezpečnostních systémů, nezobrazuje se mi žádný error nebo crash report. Zkusil jsem otevření v safe mode, reinstalaci, stažení 64-bitové i 32-bitové verze, restart zařízení a kombinace všech předchozích.

Předem děkuji za odpovědi!
creator: vojta003

title: Funzione "Opzioni"manca da "menu applicazione"
content: Pc portatile HP con Sistema Operativo Windows 10. Firefox installato da 2 anni, che si aggiorna automaticamente. Da menu Applicazione manca “Opzioni”. Ho eseguito senza successo le procedure indicate su sito ufficiale Support Mozilla. Ossia: 1. Riavvio in modalità Risoluzione dei problemi. 2. Ripristino di Firefox Ho pensato di disinstallare e poi reinstallare Firefox ma non vorrei perdere i preferiti e segnalibri che ho organizzato in cartelle. Ho cercato in rete altre soluzioni ma non trovato niente. Sapete aiutarmi per favore? “Opzioni”mi serve assolutamente per installare un programma di lavoro. Ps : non so sia utile come indicazione, ma anche su altri browser (es Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge), manca analoga funzione “Opzioni”o”Preferenze”. Grazie mille.
creator: anneka24

title: Crash at startup
content: Firefox 105.0.3 crashes at startup on Windows 11 Family 21H2 (build 22000.978) French. Location: France. No error message. Firefox main windows appears for a tenth of a second and disappears. Same in troubleshoot mode (Shift+firefox.exe). The troubleshoot dialog box shows for a tenth of a second and disappears. No error message. No crash report generated. Device is an MSI GF62 Thin. Antivirus is Microsoft's Essential Suite. No Norton, Avast, AVG, Malwarebytes or any other security software is installed (checked in task explorer and on the disk). I got this on another old PackardBell laptop (Windows 10) with the same security configuration. Cannot figure out what the problem is. I have no clue whatsoever. Any idea?
creator: morgangamergeek

title: Auto-fill forms that are saved via jquery.ajax
content: This might more be a feature suggestion, as I cannot find any way to make Firefox remember a form saved via jquery.ajax()? One-page-sites save data via ajax, which seems to skip the auto-fill save in Firefox. Even though the form is saved as Post with the javascript "new FormData()" in the data attribute. Perhaps a right-click on a input element could present a "save form to auto-fill" in the context menu?

title: Firefox does not remove Tracking Cookies
content: Firefox does NOT deleted Tracking Cookies upon close even though that option is selected. Please see attached Screen Shots illusgtrating one example where 45 Tracking Cookies remained.
creator: eb47

title: Firefox 105.0.3-1 Broken Video Playback on Linux
content:
I installed this version of Firefox from the repository and I can no longer play back video. I have done a number of things to try to get the video playback to work again, however the bug persists. What I've done:

  • Reset Firefox
  • Disabled Hardware Acceleration
  • Disabled Any and ALL Plug-Ins
  • Uninstalled and Re-Installed the Browser
  • Switched between kernels
  • Ensured that Pipewire is functioning properly
  • Ensured that my hardware is functioning properly

I've done some other smaller things in my system to try to get this back, but as it appears, this bug still persists even after a delay in dropping the new version.
creator: sfacemire40

title: Mozilla Firefox failing as a browser on many levels. I find myself having to switch to safari or chrome to complete transactions.
content:
bold textMozilla Firefox failing as a browser on many levels. It's been my default browser for years. I am now having to switch to safari or chrome to complete transactions & for basic utilization of websites where there was not a problem before.

Firefox 105.0.3 MacOs Monterey Version 12.6

title: Printing pages from the Bendigo Bank home banking is not working properly since last week
content: At work I always log on to the Bendigo Bank to look at transactions on our bank account. I need to print them off once a week. Since last week the pages don't print properly. Instead of showing the entire transactions, they are now half covered because the left hand side of the print page is covered by the bank's menu which always shows at the side of the webpage. I contacted the bank who said they'd had other firefox users complaining about this. They said that it's firefox's fault and follows an update which was done. Please can you help? I have attached a snipping tool image of the problem.

title: Incompatibility
content:
Macquarie Bank says its website is incompatible with Firefox and that I must change my browser to Google Chrome.

When I try to log on it often returns "An error has occurred. Oops, something went wrong. "

Their help desk advise that I can try cleaning up my junk files to make it work, but the fix is temporary. This log-on failure can happen several times a day, so that is not a workable option.

Perhaps it would be easier to change my bank!

Any suggestions?
creator: lynne14

title: you stopped me from playing with Crystal island on my Facebook account
content:
Did Not Connect: Potential Security Issue

Firefox detected an issue and did not continue to int01crystal.qublixgames.com. The website is either misconfigured or your computer clock is set to the wrong time.

It’s likely the website’s certificate is expired, which prevents Firefox from connecting securely. If you visit this site, attackers could try to steal information like your passwords, emails, or credit card details.

What can you do about it?

The issue is most likely with the website, and there is nothing you can do to resolve it. You can notify the website’s administrator about the problem.

Learn more…

j.o.hobbs@hotmail.com
